Marietta.Sprayberry High School: Sprayberry High School is a public high school located in eastern Cobb County in Marietta, Georgia, United States, a suburb of Atlanta. It is a comprehensive senior high school (grades 9-12) with approximately 1700 students. It opened in 1952 at a location on Cobb Parkway and moved to its current location at 2525 Sandy Plains Road in 1973.
